Title: Engineer Manager Tại Nhà Máy Đắk Lắk
Company: Công Ty TNHH Thai Nakorn Patana Việt Nam
Location: Phú Yên, Vietnam, Số 636 Nguyễn Tất Thành, Phường Bình Kiến, Tỉnh Đắk Lắk, Số 636 Nguyễn Tất Thành, Phường Bình Kiến, Tỉnh Đắk Lắk, Việt Nam
Job Description:
- Quản lý và điều hành bộ phận kỹ thuật – bảo trì: Phân công công việc, đào tạo và giám sát đội ngũ kỹ thuật viên, đảm bảo tính sẵn sàng và an toàn của máy móc thiết bị trong quá trình sản xuất.
- Lập kế hoạch và triển khai bảo trì thiết bị: Thiết lập, triển khai và kiểm soát kế hoạch bảo trì định kỳ (PM) và bảo trì dự phòng (Predictive Maintenance).
- Giảm thiểu thời gian dừng máy và kéo dài tuổi thọ thiết bị.
- Quản lý hệ thống kỹ thuật điện và cơ điện:
- Theo dõi hoạt động của hệ thống điện công nghiệp, máy móc trong sản xuất dược phẩm
- Đảm bảo tuân thủ quy chuẩn kỹ thuật và an toàn điện.
- Tham gia và lãnh đạo các dự án cải tiến kỹ thuật:
- Tối ưu hóa dây chuyền sản xuất, nâng cao năng suất, tiết kiệm năng lượng và chi phí.
- Áp dụng công nghệ mới, tự động hóa các công đoạn sản xuất.
- Hỗ trợ kỹ thuật sản xuất: Phối hợp với bộ phận sản xuất, QA để xử lý các vấn đề kỹ thuật phát sinh trong quá trình sản xuất.
- Kiểm soát ngân sách và chi phí kỹ thuật – bảo trì
- Lập kế hoạch ngân sách hàng năm.
- Theo dõi và tối ưu hóa chi phí mua sắm phụ tùng, vật tư thay thế.
- Xây dựng và áp dụng các hệ thống quản lý kỹ thuật:
- Áp dụng các hệ thống như TPM, 5S, ISO 9001, ISO 14001, CMMS vào hoạt động kỹ thuật – bảo trì

Title: Assistant Site Manager (C&S)
Location: Vinhomes Ocean Park 3, Nghia Tru Ward, Van Giang, Hung Yen, 30th Floor, Tower 1, Capital Place, 29 Lieu Giai St.,Ngoc Khanh Ward, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi
Job Description:
• Assist the PM to lead the site team, supervision consultant to manage related matters of the project through construction and project completion and handover.
• To monitor and manage project schedule, project quality inspections and manage project costs to meet approved budget and targets.
• Review of the construction drawings & shop drawings, MOS, MA submitted by the Contractor to ensure this tally with requirement and practical for construction and operation.
• Supervise the construction of works to ensure that it is complying with construction specifications, procedures and design requirements and standards.
• Manage EHS (Environment – Health – Safety) at site to ensure comply with Law requirement and company requirement.
• Coordinate with Project department team, other departments / relevant parties to track and monitor the progress during, design, construction stage and handover stage.
• Perform any other duties assigned.

BENEFITS:
• Competitive Salary and a guaranteed 13th-month salary.
• Annual variable bonus and performance-based salary reviews.
• Comprehensive Health & Wellness Scheme (9 million/year).
• Bao Viet Insurance for staff and dependents.

Title: Sales Supervisor (Nganh Hang: Điêu hoa không khi)
Location: HCM, Đồng Nai, Vũng Tàu, Bình Thuận, Lâm Đồng, Đak Lak, Gia Lai, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Position Overview:
The RAC Supervisor - GT Channel is responsible for managing distributor and dealer performance across the South East region (from Ho Chi Minh City to Dong Nai, Vung Tau, Binh Thuan) and Tay Nguyen. This role focuses on achieving sales targets, managing PSI execution, expanding coverage, and strengthening distributor relationships.
Frequent travel is required to visit distributors, dealers, and key clients within the assigned territories.
Key Responsibilities:
Distributor & Dealer Management
• Manage and develop distributors (NPP) and dealers (ĐL) in assigned provinces.
• Agree on monthly and quarterly sell-in targets and monitor sell-out performance.
• Conduct regular PSI reviews to balance purchase, sales, and inventory levels.
• Support new distributor/dealer onboarding and expansion of sales network.
Sales Target Achievement
• Deliver assigned revenue, product mix, and coverage targets for the region.
• Expand active outlets and increase market penetration.
• Ensure proper implementation of company pricing and promotion policies.
Market Development & Customer Visit
• Conduct regular business reviews and field visits with distributors and dealers.
• Maintain strong customer relationships and resolve business issues promptly.
• Collect market intelligence, competitor information, and pricing trends.
Forecast & Reporting
• Prepare weekly and monthly sales reports and forecasts.
• Maintain accurate data tracking and sales analysis using Excel/CRM tools.
• Provide timely updates to Sales Manager regarding regional performance.

Job Description:
Đảm bảo hoạt động thông suốt cho hệ thống mạng LAN, DC, DR, WAN
• Lắp đặt và cấu hình thiết bị mạng cho Hội sở, các chi nhánh, phòng giao dịch
• Theo dõi, kiểm tra, ghi chép, quản trị các thiết bị mạng (Router, Switch, Modem..), các đường truyền mạng leased-line, MPLS, P2P, ADSL,... băng thông mạng để phát hiện và xử lý các sự cố cũng như lỗi không làm ảnh hưởng tới hoạt động của ngân hàng.
• Hỗ trợ giám sát việc kết nối video conference.
• Tiếp nhận các thiết bị từ nhà cung cấp.
• Quản lý việc kết nối tại DC và DR
• Setup các kết nối khi có yêu cầu
• Khắc phục sự cố liên quan
• Phối hợp với các nhà cung cấp để bảo hành/sửa lỗi các sự cố xảy ra trên các kết nối WAN
• Bảo hành các thiết bị mạng.
Đảm bảo hoạt động thông suốt cho hệ thống Internet, IP-phone. Phòng ngừa và phát hiện virus
• Theo dõi tình trạng sử dụng và khắc phục sự cố các đường truyền Internet của HO và các CN, PGD để đảm bảo người dùng Internet không bị gián đoạn.
• Quản lý, lắp đặt, cấu hình, quản trị hệ thống tổng đài IP và IP phone cho người sử dụng.
• Quản lý các hệ thống ghi âm CallRex, hệ thống lời chào cho Hotline.
• Theo dõi kiểm tra việc cập nhật các phiên bản vá lỗi của hệ thông. Giám sát việc thực hiện các chính sách bảo mật của nhân viên
Giám sát vận hành hệ thống Firewall, IPS
• Phân quyền các yêu cầu kết nối vào hệ thống server, hệ thống DBA tại DR, DC cho người dùng.
• Phân quyền kết nối giữa các ứng dụng của các vùng server với nhau
• Phân quyền kết nối cho các dự án CNTT liên quan đến việc test, golive.
• Phân tích logging , xử lý các lỗi liên quan đến truy cập ứng dụng.
Monitor hệ thống IPs phân tích các nguy cơ tấn công hệ thông mạng.
Phối hợp xây dựng hạ tầng mạng, phát triển mạng lưới Chi nhánh
• Lập dự toán về hạ tầng mạng
• Thiết kế mô hình kết nối mạng.
• Quy hoạch địa chỉ IP cho Chi nhánh
• Giám sát thi công triển khai hạ tầng mạng.
Quản trị hệ thống truy cập từ xa VPN
• Quản lý cầu hình hệ thống Citrix gateway
• Tạo quyền VPN cho người dùng khi có yêu cầu
• Phân quyền truy cập cho user được cấp VPN
Quản trị hệ thống cân bằng tải ứng dụng Citrix
• Phân quyền cân bằng tải cho các ứng dụng kết nối đến các server

Title: Senior Production Planner
Job Description:
I. ROLE PURPOSE
The Senior Production Planner is responsible for creating, monitoring, and adjusting production schedules to ensure manufacturing processes run smoothly and efficiently. In the F&B sector, this role focuses on balancing inventory levels with customer demand while minimizing waste and ensuring food safety standards.
II. KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES
1. Production Scheduling & Capacity Optimization
• Develop and maintain production timelines to align manufacturing output with market needs.
• Develop weekly and daily production plans based on sales forecasts, inventory levels, and plant capacity.
• Evaluate machine and labor availability to optimize production lines and minimize downtime.
• Adjust schedules "on the fly" in response to equipment breakdowns, ingredient shortages, or urgent order changes.
2. Inventory Management & Material Control
• Oversee stock levels to ensure continuous production without excessive overhead.
• Monitor stock levels of finished goods and raw materials to prevent overstocking or stockouts.
• Strictly manage "First-Expiry, First-Out" (FEFO) protocols to ensure product freshness and safety.
3. Cross-Functional Coordination & Reporting
• Facilitate communication between departments and track operational efficiency.
• Act as a bridge between Sales, Warehouse, and Production departments to align supply with market demand.
• Explain technical production data to non-technical stakeholders, such as Restaurant or Sales Managers.
• Track and report on Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) including Schedule Adherence, Production Yield, and Waste levels.

Title: Accounting Supervisor
Location: Vincom Center Building, Ho Chi Minh City, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Position Overview:
We are seeking a detail-oriented Accounting Supervisor with over 5 years of full-cycle accounting experience. This role is crucial in reviewing company accounts, preparing financial statements, and ensuring compliance with local tax regulations.
Key Responsibilities:
• Account Accuracy and Maintenance: Ensure accuracy and integrity of all accounting records, maintaining adherence to international accounting standards.
• Marketing and Promotion Cost Management: Oversee and track expenditure related to marketing and promotional activities, ensuring they are within budget and aligned with financial strategies.
• Tax Compliance: Manage all tax filing processes, ensuring accuracy, timeliness, and compliance with both local and international tax laws.
• Audit Management: Serve as the main contact for external audits, coordinating preparations and supporting successful audit outcomes with no discrepancies.
• Internal Controls and Compliance: Implement and monitor internal controls over financial processes, ensuring compliance with financial regulations and internal policies.
• Policy Management: Develop and oversee policies regarding travel allowances, expense reimbursements, and daily expense approvals, ensuring they align with company standards and fiscal responsibility.

Title: Senior Tax Specialist
Location: 28 Bis Mac Dinh Chi, Da Kao Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Tòa nhà Five Star - 28bis Mạc Đĩnh Chi, Phường Đa kao, Quận 1, Thành Phố Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
1. Operational & Compliance Management
• Prepare and file periodic tax returns (VAT, CIT, Foreign Contractor Tax, Transfer Pricing, PIT).
• Lead monthly and year-end tax reconciliations and settlements.
• Monitor, manage, assess and advice technical improvement of e-invoice systems and ensure invoices are issued in compliance with changing requirement by regulations.
• Reconcile tax liabilities with local tax authorities and resolve discrepancies.
• Coordinate and support tax audits, financial statement audits, and inquiries from authorities or internal stakeholders.
• Maintain a robust internal tax compliance framework, including controls and process documentation.
2. Advisory & Strategic Tax Planning
• Provide tax advisory support for new services, business models, promotions, and pricing structures.
• Assess and advise on the tax implications of product or service launches, contractual structures, and commercial arrangements.
• Lead or participate in cross-functional projects on tax automation, compliance enhancement, or system integration (e.g. tax module in Oracle, e-invoice system, internal systems).
• Continuously analyze risks and opportunities from ongoing tax reforms, and update leadership on implications and strategies.
• Evaluate and recommend tax-efficient business structures and intercompany arrangements.
• Build and maintain strong working relationships with local and central tax authorities, including participation in consultations or lobbying activities where applicable.
3. Tax Policy Intelligence & Risk Management
• Proactively track and interpret changes in Vietnamese tax legislation, especially those impacting the digital economy, e-commerce, gig economy, and ride hailing.
• Translate evolving regulations into practical business impact assessments and mitigation plans.
• Develop internal alerts, training materials, and update sessions for relevant stakeholders to enhance tax awareness across departments.
• Represent the company’s interests in policy discussions or through industry associations if applicable.
4. Leadership & Team Development
• Lead and mentor a small team of tax accountants, ensuring professional growth and performance.
• Foster a culture of ownership, curiosity, and collaboration in tax and finance operations.
• Collaborate with finance, legal, operations, and product teams to ensure tax-compliant business execution.
• Ad hoc request/projects as needed.

Title: Process Maintenance Engineer (3 shift working)
Location: Long Thành, Dong Nai, Vietnam, Long Duc Industrial Park, Long Duc commune, Long Thanh Dist., Dong Nai Province
Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY
The Process Maintenance Engineer is responsible for ensuring the reliability and optimal performance of manufacturing equipment, with a focus on both electrical and mechanical systems. This role involves advanced troubleshooting, preventive and corrective maintenance, and continuous process improvement, while maintaining strict adherence to safety and regulatory standards.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES
• Execute preventive and corrective maintenance activities to enhance equipment reliability and minimize downtime.
• Conduct root cause analysis (RCA) and implement corrective and preventive actions (CAPA).
• Analyze equipment performance data to improve MTTR, MTBF, and OEE.
• Troubleshoot complex issues in electrical, mechanical, and pneumatic systems.
• Perform risk assessments and ensure compliance with Safety and Regulatory requirements.
• Manage spare parts inventory and evaluate alternative components for cost-effectiveness and longevity.
• Maintain accurate maintenance documentation and equipment history records.
• Support equipment calibration, validation, and project execution.
• Mentor and train technicians and junior engineers through hands-on guidance and development of One Point Lessons (OPLs)

Title: Mid-Level Interior Designer (Hospitality)
Job Requirements:
II. SKILL (Technical Drawing, Coordination & Project Execution)
A Mid-Level Designer must demonstrate strong technical ability and begin managing detailed drawing packages independently, supporting project rollout.
1. Technical Drawing & Documentation
• Prepares accurate floor plans, RCPs, typical elevations, and joinery details for tender/construction.
• Converts concept direction into detailed technical outputs for submission and site execution.
• Leads detailed development for assigned room types or small public areas.
• Manages FF&E schedules, specifications, and sample follow‑ups.
• Creates internal presentations, mood boards, and drawing layouts to explain design logic.
• Proficient in AutoCAD and understanding Revit for project documentation.
2. Coordination
• Interfaces with MEP, structural, lighting and QS consultants to ensure alignment in drawings.
• Supports Senior Designer in consultant workshops and technical reviews.
• Assists in reviewing vendor/shop drawings, mock-ups, and technical submissions.
• Assists in responding to RFIs and reviewing shop drawings.
3. English Communication
• Communicates effectively in English across drawing notations, coordination emails, and meetings.
• Supports bilingual documentation where necessary.

III. KNOWLEDGE (Design Standards & Technical Awareness)
A Mid-Level Designer deepens technical understanding and expands awareness of multidisciplinary impacts on interior design execution.
1. Hospitality Standards
• Strong understanding of hotel operator guidelines (Accor, Marriott, Hilton, Aman, etc.).
• Familiar with brand standards, OS&E implications, and operational flow.
2. Code & Technical Knowledge
• Knows key local regulations: fire safety, escape routes, accessibility, wet area requirements.
• Understands how architectural and MEP systems influence interior layouts and detailing.
3. Material & Detailing Expertise
• Strong knowledge of materials, finishes, joinery systems, and durability requirements.
• Ability to resolve typical detailing issues (tile transitions, joinery interfaces, shopfitting details).
4. Multidisciplinary Awareness (not mastery)
• Understands basic logic behind: MEP routing, HVAC grille placement, electrical zones, acoustic considerations, structural constraints.
• Able to identify conflicts early and escalate appropriately.

Title: Officer, Career Services Engagement (Event & Communication)
Location: Ecopark, Hà Nội, Hưng Yên, Hung Yen, Vietnam, Ecopark campus, Ecopark Township, Van Giang District, Hung Yen
Job Description:
POSITION PURPOSE

The Career Services Engagement Officer is responsible for planning and executing career-related events, while developing and implementing creative communication strategies to promote not only activities but also other career services to BUV students. These efforts contribute to enhancing students’ career readiness and professional development. He or she is also responsible to provide an excellent customer service to our students, lecturers, parents and partners at British University Vietnam. The role is subject to change depending on the needs of the University.


AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY

Career Events and Activities (20%)
Plan, coordinate and execute career-related events, including semesterly industry talks, skill workshops, company tours, recruitment days and the annual BUV Career Fair for BUV students
Collaborate with Career Services & Industry Relations team members, lecturers, internal departments and external event-related vendors to ensure smooth coordination and alignment of the event objectives
Collect feedback, report outcomes, and propose improvements for future events
Promote Career Services & Events (60%)
Develop and implement engaging communication strategies to promote career services and events through social media, emails, and on campus channels.
Target audience: BUV students
Wider audience: Public stakeholders including BUV Partners, parents, prospective students and parents.
Design and produce visual content, such as social media posts, event banners, backdrops, digital slides, flyers, etc.
Write and edit clear, engaging content for diverse communication needs, including promotional social media posts, announcement emails, formal documents, event script, etc, in English and Vietnamese.
Ensure consistency of branding and tone in all career-related communication materials
Operation & Administration (15%)
Record & Filling system: Maintain and update the record and filing system of the activities and each student’s Personal & Social Growth record.
Database: Maintain and improve the database of activities and attendance that enables capturing the university’s activities, student’s development journey and collaborations between the university and industry partners.
Administration: Assist in the administration of the operations of Career Services in charge.
Customer Services: Ensure quality customer services & timely responses to a variety of written requests from students and parents for information relating to career services via telephone, correspondence and/or electronic mail
Others (5%)
Participate and support other extra-curricular activities of the department
Assist the department in preparing periodic reports and newsletter updates for Management and the University
Assist the Student Engagement Department in other areas when the need arises
Undertake any other duties that may be assigned from time to time

Đây là vị trí Fresher, không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm, được đào tạo bài bản 100% về kỹ thuật, phần mềm và tiếng Anh để phát triển lâu dài trong lĩnh vực thiết kế kết cấu xây dựng.

Mô Tả Công Việc
• Thiết kế kết cấu cho nhà dân dụng & thương mại
• Đọc, phân tích bản vẽ kiến trúc – kết cấu để triển khai bản vẽ kỹ thuật.

• Đảm bảo chất lượng bản vẽ, tiến độ công việc và yêu cầu từ khách hàng.
• Được tham gia các chương trình đào tạo kỹ thuật – phần mềm – tiếng Anh của công ty.
• Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo phân công của quản lý.

Title: Production Manager
Company: Công Ty TNHH Pandora Production Việt Nam
Location: Số 6 Đường số 3, Khu công nghiệp Việt Nam - Singapore III, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Vietnam - Singapore Industrial Park III, Hoi Nghia Ward, Tan Uyen, Binh Duong
Job Description:
Key objectives:
The ideal candidate will lead the production operation with full strategic and operational accountability, ensuring best-in-class jewelry manufacturing, cost efficiency, on-time delivery, and superior quality aligned with Pandora Production Vietnam’s goals. He/She will foster strong stakeholder collaboration, drive innovation and customer centricity, and build a high-performing, trust-based leadership team while strengthening the local talent pipeline and engagement.

Key duties:
Strategy & Manufacturing Setup
- Build and lead production teams for factory setup, including organizational design, capability development, and operational readiness
- Implement scalable production concepts and ensure smooth ramp-up to meet operational KPIs
- Translate PPV manufacturing strategy into actionable production plans, capacity models, and execution priorities
- Own short- to mid-term production performance while building long-term manufacturing capability
Operations & Performance Management
- Lead daily production operations across FE manufacturing processes, ensuring stable execution across all shifts
- Drive end-to-end performance in line with Pandora KPIs
- Optimize allocation of manpower, equipment, materials, and methods
- Establish robust performance reviews, deviation management, corrective action systems, and escalation mechanisms
Process & Technical Excellence
- Govern manufacturing processes through standardization, parameter control, SOPs, and control plans
- Apply PFMEA, SPC, and structured problem-solving methodologies
- Lead root cause analysis for complex production issues using Lean, Six Sigma, and data-driven approaches
- Oversee new equipment commissioning, process validation, pilot-to-mass production scale-up, and handover
- Ensure consistency of processes, controls, and performance across units and shifts
Continuous Improvement & Innovation
- Drive initiatives to increase productivity and capacity utilization, reduce defects and lead time, and improve process stability
- Partner with Engineering and PEX on automation, digitalization, tooling optimization, and industrial engineering improvements
- Capture and deploy best practices across plants and functions
Cross-Functional & Stakeholder Collaboration
- Align with Planning & Scheduling on load planning, capacity balancing, and prioritization
- Collaborate with Quality and Engineering to resolve technical and systemic issues
- Partner with Finance to optimize cost performance and working capital
- Ensure ERP/MES systems effectively support production planning, execution, and reporting
- Maintain strong closed-loop communication between shop floor and management teams
People Leadership & Capability Building
- Develop strong production leadership teams with clear accountability and succession planning
- Build technical capability through structured training, coaching, and on-the-job development
- Foster a culture of ownership, discipline, collaboration, continuous improvement, and safety

Title: Marketing & Communications Associate
Company: First Trust ACPA Vietnam CO., LTD
Location: 8th floor Hoa Binh Office Building, 106 Hoang Quoc Viet, Level 8, Hoa Binh International Towers 106 Hoang Quoc Viet street, Cau Giay District, Hanoi, Vietnam
Job Description:
We are looking for a Marketing & Communications Associate to support marketing execution across APAC (primarily Singapore and Vietnam markets). This entry-level role provides development opportunities in content creation, design, email marketing, and campaign execution, within a professional services environment.

You will work closely with senior stakeholders and gain hands-on exposure to regional marketing initiatives, with opportunities to contribute ideas and grow into planning responsibilities.
To succeed in this role, you should be curious, adaptable, and comfortable taking initiative. We are looking for someone who enjoys improving how things are done, works well with others, and can balance execution with thoughtful input. Strong English and confidence working in a professional setting are essential.

ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Campaign Execution & Support
• Plan, schedule, and coordinate digital marketing campaigns with clearly-defined objectives, identification of target publics, messaging, and creative media.
• Prepare campaign content, visuals, and timelines.
• Coordinate deliverables across channels and support basic performance tracking.
• Furnish monthly summary reports on the firm’s marketing activity and growth and propose areas of further development, where applicable.

2. Content, Email Marketing & Communications
• Conceive and develop engaging and targeted Business-to-Business (B2B) content marketing strategies for the firm’s professional services, activities, and branding initiatives.
• Create and adapt content for websites, social media (primarily LinkedIn), and email marketing (newsletters).
• Support email marketing execution, including formatting, scheduling, and reporting.
• Perform research-driven analysis on possible advertising opportunities – inclusive of print and digital media - as well as the media employed, identification of keywords for SEO purposes (for the web), etc.

3. Brand Positioning & Visual Assets
• Design marketing materials such as social media visuals, presentations, and basic collaterals.
• Ability to edit short-form videos for marketing use (basic cuts, captions, simple transitions) – a plus.
• Support basic photography or visual asset coordination when needed.
• Apply brand guidelines consistently across all materials.
• Support development of visual concepts for campaigns and communications.

4. Strategic Support & Initiative
• Support campaign planning through preparation of content plans and timelines.
• Contribute ideas to improve marketing effectiveness, content formats, or processes
• Proactively identify opportunities for improvement and suggest practical solutions
• Take ownership of assigned tasks and follow through to completion

WHAT WE OFFER
• Opportunities to collaborate with international teams and gain regional exposure.
• Full statutory benefits including insurance and annual leave.
• Team-building activities, training workshops, and company retreats.
• 13th-month salary, Annual performance bonus.
• Premium Personal Health Insurance.
• Access to a training library and courses conducted by international experts from Head Office
• Skill development through global client collaboration
• Dynamic, inclusive, and innovative-driven work environment

Title: Senior Legal Officer
Location: Ford Vietnam Limited, 6th floor, 23 Phan Chu Trinh, Hanoi, Human Resources Department - Ford Vietnam Limited, 6th floor, 23 Phan Chu Trinh, Hanoi/ Haiduong Assembly Plant, Tu Minh – Hai Duong
Job Description:
This role will take full ownership of manufacturing compliance, strategic labor relations, and government audit management to ensure uninterrupted operations and 100% adherence to Vietnamese law. Beyond plant-level operations, the position provides comprehensive advisory on commercial contracts, corporate governance, and risk mitigation to safeguard the company’s brand and long-term business objectives.

1. MANUFACTURING & PLANT OPERATIONS (INDUSTRIAL LEGAL OWNERSHIP)
- Ownership of Plant Compliance: Take full ownership of the legal and regulatory framework governing Ford’s Hai Duong Plant. Ensure the facility maintains all necessary permits for manufacturing, quality, and technical safety to avoid interuption to production.
- Land, Construction & Environment, Health and Safety (EHS) Responsibility: Oversee legal matters for land use, expansions, and construction, partnering with EHS to ensure full environmental compliance and long-term operational sustainability.
- Operational Sensitivity: Provide timely, actionable legal advice that respects production schedules and the requirements of the manufacturing environment.

2. HUMAN RESOURCES & LABOR RELATIONS (STRATEGIC PEOPLE PARTNER)
- Ownership of the Employment Lifecycle: Manage the legal compliance of all labor processes, ensuring recruitment, contracts, and terminations align with the Vietnam Labor Code and global HR policies.
- Industrial Harmony at Hai Duong: Act as the legal lead for labor relations at the plant. Support HR in managing the Work Rules, HR & Employment policies, Trade Union relationship and Collective Labor Agreements (CLA) with a commitment to maintaining a stable, dispute-free workforce.
- Disciplinary & Dispute Strategy: Lead the legal strategy for labor discipline and grievance handling. Take ownership of resolving disputes internally and represent the company in labor-related mediation or litigation when necessary.

3. AUDIT MANAGEMENT & AUTHORITY LIAISON (DEFENSE & RESOLUTION)
- Strategic Audit Lead: Maintain the company’s “audit-ready” status by coordinating with Tax, HR, and Finance to ensure all documentation is organized and legally sound.
- Authority Management (Tax, HR, Labor): Act as the primary legal point of contact during regular and ad-hoc audits by government bodies (labor inspectors, tax authorities, etc.), managing inspections to safeguard the company’s interests.
- Post-Audit Rectification: Manage the post-audit rectification process by resolving findings, improving internal procedures, and drafting precise official responses to authorities.

4. LEGAL COUNSEL & ADVISORY
- Regulatory & Strategic Advice: Monitor and interpret evolving laws to provide strategic compliance guidance across all company functions.
- Business-Aligned Support: Deliver commercially focused legal advice that supports business objectives and aligns with strategic decisions.
- Risk Management: Conduct legal impact assessments on company programs to proactively identify and mitigate potential risks.
- Brand Protection: Review marketing materials and public communications to protect the company’s reputation and ensure legal compliance.

5. REVIEW AND CONTRACT MANAGEMENT & NEGOTIATION (SUPPORT PURCHASING)
- Review Contract: Partner with the Purchasing team to review and draft contracts, agreements, and MOUs that support plant operations.
- Negotiation Ownership: Draft, review, and negotiate complex commercial agreements to secure favorable terms and ensure effective risk management.

6. CORPORATE GOVERNANCE & LICENSING FOR PLANT OPERATION
- Corporate Governance: Draft and review internal policies and corporate decisions to ensure legal soundness and uphold high governance standards.
- Licensing Management: Manage the full lifecycle of corporate licenses (Investment Registration Certificate and Enterprises Registration Certificate, Import/Export, and production certificates) to ensure continuous legal operation and timely renewals.
- Dealer Advisory: Provide legal guidance to dealers on licensing and regulatory requirements to ensure the compliant execution of new programs.

7. DISPUTE RESOLUTION & INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
- Dispute Resolution Commitment: Strategically manage and provide legal support for all forms of disputes (contractual, customer, supplier, product liability) while overseeing litigation and arbitration to ensure favorable resolutions.
- IP Asset Management: Work with team to support the protection of the company’s IP portfolio, managing renewals and legal documentation (POA) to safeguard critical company assets and ensure their long-term value, especially when we need to work with local authorities in Hai Phong.

8. COMPLIANCE, ADMINISTRATION & SUPPORT
- Champion of Integrity: Promote Ford’s Code of Conduct and Anti-Bribery policies, fostering a culture of integrity and compliance throughout the organization.
- Legal Training: Develop and deliver specialized training programs—such as Labor Law and Audit Readiness—to enhance organizational adherence to legal requirements.
- Operational Excellence: Support Office of General Counsel efficiency by managing internal administration, reporting, and providing high-quality English-Vietnamese legal translations.

9. OTHER DUTIES
- Perform any other tasks as assigned, embodying the Ford OS behaviors of Ownership, Responsibility, and Commitment to Outcomes to contribute to the overall success of the Office of General Counsel.

Title: Sales Admin Intern (Japanese-speaking)
Location: Etown central (HCM office), HCM Office: 20th Floor, E Town Central - 11 Doan Van Bo, Ward 13, District 4; Hanoi office: 8th Floor, V Building, 125-127 Ba Trieu St, Hai Ba Trung District
Job Description:
You will be mainly responsible for supporting and improving operations for our existing business, Navigos Search.
This role is especially suitable for someone who can utilize Japanese language skills (speaking and/or reading) in a business setting.
You will work closely with Japanese staff and internal consultants to support daily operations, follow up with Japanese candidates, assist communication-related tasks, and contribute to business initiatives such as events and market/company research.

• Create compelling and SEO-optimized content for product descriptions and A+ content mainly for Amazon platform
Sáng tạo nội dung hấp dẫn và tối ưu hóa SEO cho phần mô tả sản phẩm và nội dung A+ trên nền tảng thương mại điện tử Amazon.

Job Description:
TPF GROUP is an independent full-service creative and technology agency for brands ready to break free from convention. Powered by our end-to-end capabilities, we drive real impact that moves brands forward.
To Play Forward signals that everything the agency does is built to move; people, brands, industries, in a deliberate, positive direction. More than a name, it’s a mindset that embraces change, leverages technology and designs for tomorrow while delivering for today.
At TPF every idea is purposeful, every execution is precise and every partnership is built on shared ambition. We think bigger, move faster and play forward.
Welcome to TPF! To be part of our team of experts in Ho Chi Minh city.

Title: Nhân Viên Phụ Trách Kinh Doanh (Tìm Bệnh Nhân/ Khách Hàng Có Nhu Cầu Sử Dụng Dịch Vụ Y Tế Tại Nhật)
Company: Công Ty TNHH Hỗ Trợ Y Tế Quốc Tế IMS Việt Nam
Location: cạnh hồ Thiền Quang, phường Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, cạnh hồ Thiền Quang, phường Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội
Job Description:
• Tìm kiếm bệnh nhân/ khách hàng (không tham gia bảo hiểm y tế công lập tại Nhật Bản) đang sinh sống tại Việt Nam có nhu cầu điều trị, khám chữa bệnh chuyên sâu, kiểm tra sức khỏe định kỳ, xin ý kiến y tế thứ hai,…. tại Nhật Bản. Cụ thể, đối tượng là khách hàng có khả năng chi trả chi phí y tế từ 800 triệu VNĐ trở lên.
• Xây dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ với các cơ sở y tế, chuyên gia y tế, các công ty và tổ chức đối tác tại Việt Nam để thúc đẩy việc giới thiệu bệnh nhân/khách hàng. Khi giải thích về dịch vụ của công ty, nhân viên sẽ cần thuyết trình, tham dự các sự kiện kết nối và tư vấn cá nhân.
• Phối hợp với các điều phối viên y tế quốc tế tại Việt Nam và Nhật Bản để cung cấp các dịch vụ như tư vấn cho bệnh nhân/khách hàng, thu thập và dịch thuật thông tin y tế, xử lý hợp đồng và thanh toán, các công việc liên hệ, điều phối với phía Nhật Bản, theo dõi và hỗ trợ định kì sau điều trị, thăm khám.
• Xây dựng chiến lược và đạt được mục tiêu thông qua việc tiếp cận và quản lý mối quan hệ. Bên cạnh đó, nhân viên sẽ phối hợp với Phòng Marketing để theo dõi xu hướng thị trường trong lĩnh vực chăm sóc sức khỏe tại Việt Nam và xác định các cơ hội mở rộng kinh doanh thông qua việc quảng bá trên mạng xã hội.
• Hỗ trợ hoạt động kinh doanh của công ty mẹ tại Nhật Bản (kiểm tra và nhập liệu các chứng từ của công ty mẹ bằng hệ thống điện tử, hỗ trợ nhân viên Nhật Bản đến Việt Nam công tác), hỗ trợ công việc hành chính (mua hàng, tổng hợp hồ sơ chấm công).
• Báo cáo, liên lạc và bàn bạc với cấp trên bằng tiếng Anh hoặc tiếng Nhật. Nộp báo cáo công việc hàng tuần vào thứ sáu theo mẫu quy định.
• Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo chỉ đạo của cấp trên.

Plan and execute regular content across social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, etc.) aligned with the brand’s direction and target market.

Title: Chief Accountant/ Kế Toán Trưởng
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Phương Tiện Điện Thông Minh Selex
Location: Số 12, ngõ 36 Xuân Thuỷ, Dịch Vọng Hậu, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội, 11a/36 Xuân Thủy, Dịch Vọng Hậu, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
1. Mô tả công việc
- Phụ trách và điều hành toàn bộ hoạt động kế toán – thuế của công ty, đảm bảo tuân thủ quy định pháp luật và chuẩn mực kế toán
- Rà soát, hoàn thiện và cải tiến quy trình, quy chế, biểu mẫu kế toán theo hướng gọn, rõ, hiệu quả và dễ kiểm soát
- Tổ chức, quản lý và phát triển đội ngũ kế toán; chịu trách nhiệm về chất lượng, tiến độ và hiệu quả công việc của bộ phận
- Kiểm soát vốn, tài sản, chi phí, giá thành; tổng hợp và cung cấp số liệu tài chính phục vụ Ban Giám đốc ra quyết định.
- Trực tiếp làm việc với cơ quan thuế, ngân hàng và các đối tác liên quan; đảm bảo công tác kế toán thuế, công nợ, tồn kho và báo cáo tài chính chính xác, kịp thời
- Phê duyệt chứng từ, thanh toán, kiểm kê tài sản và lập báo cáo tài chính định kỳ (tháng/quý/năm)
- Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo yêu cầu của Ban lãnh đạo công ty.

2. Quyền lợi
- Thu nhập cạnh tranh lên đến 35 triệu đồng/tháng hoặc cao hơn, tương xứng với năng lực và mức độ đóng góp thực tế.
- Vai trò then chốt, được tin tưởng và trao quyền thực sự trong việc quản lý và định hướng toàn bộ mảng kế toán – tài chính của công ty.
- Tham gia đóng góp ý kiến và tác động đến các quyết định quan trọng của doanh nghiệp.
- Gia nhập công ty tiên phong trong lĩnh vực xe điện thông minh và năng lượng xanh, định hướng phát triển dài hạn, cơ hội thể hiện và phát triển nghề nghiệp.
- Môi trường làm việc trẻ, năng động, đề cao hiệu quả và tinh thần đồng hành lâu dài, ghi nhận giá trị thực và đóng góp cá nhân.
- Được hưởng đầy đủ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN, thưởng theo hiệu quả công việc và các chế độ phúc lợi theo quy định của công ty.

Title: Receptionist & Administration Officer
Company: Little Genius International Kindergarten & Educational Center
Location: 200-202 Ha Huy Tap, KP. Nam Thien III , Tan Phong Ward, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, 200-202 Ha Huy Tap, KP. Nam Thien III , Tan Phong Ward, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Job Description:
Main Tasks

Enrolment
- Enroll students
- Introduce programs
- Introduce suitable classes (not only one class)
- Arrange trials
- Consult after trials (class time, teacher's feedback)
- Arrange official class (based on our current class schedule)
- Put on waiting list if there is no available class

Office Tasks
- Write receipts
- Stamp Cards
- School policy sending
- Collect Money
- Cash transaction
- Monthly tuition report
- Send message to remind trial time (see message e.g.)
- Call/Send message to remind registration after trial classes (2-3 days later)
- Call/text parents when kids are absents (two days later)
- Send parents invoice to all parents
- Record all teachers' teaching hours
- Record all staff's overtime
- Check students' attendance everyday + absence reason
- Send all letters (holiday, new policy, changes…..) to all parents
- Print out and put all necessary documents on the shelves of reception area
- Pick up and drop off all students
- Input all data of students
- Input and update all tuition fee information
- Input all parents' complaints and feedback, reason of recess
- Consult parents during Events
- Check email and online registration to consult parents everyday
- Take parents to school tour - introduce all suitable classes
- Update students' number of trials, recess, new registrations
- Undertake other related duties as determined by manager

Bus Duties
- Check & update the bus time every day (if necessary)
- Update and give bus list to drivers everyday (if anything is new)

Title: Warehouse Supervisor - Life Science
Location: Nhon Trach 3 Industrial Park, Nhon Trach, Dong Nai, 106 Nguyen Van Troi street, Phu Nhuan Dist., HCMC Vietnam
Job Description:
Report to: Distribution Head
Place of work: Nhon Trach 3 Industrial Park, Nhon Trach, Dong Nai

Your Roles:
The Warehouse Supervisor is responsible for all areas under the Chemical Distribution Center, i.e. inbound/outbound/EHS/QA operations and local delivery to customers, in accordance with the corporate, and departmental strategy as well as to ensure the accurate and timely fulfillment of all orders. The tasks including all concerned Policies of the company are to be implemented. To organize EHS (Environmental Health Safety), Security, and QA through corporate Policies, GDP, and ISO standards at the Chemical Distribution Center (CDC).

What Should You Do:
• Ensure the effectiveness of local delivery management through flexibility, and ensure CDC operations are aligned with the distribution strategies to optimize the cost of distribution through Leans and Innovation.
• Reliable physical stock to guarantee optimal processing and to provide accurate information.
• Supervise and develop the team's performance by leading and motivating them to maximize services and develop a mindset that ensures the alignment with the corporate & department goals and KPIs.
• Coordinate with the internal and external functions to smoothen the processes and share information.
• Incorporate company policies regarding EHS, Security, and QA with operational excellence to reduce environmental risks and health hazards.
• Lead the projects to complete within the timeline and budget and assigned tasks to work prioritization.
• Having good knowledge in WMS, DG Chemical Warehouse management.
• Ensuring VN regulation are respected and followed in terms of handling, storing, importation and transportation including 3PL logistical service management.

Company: Tổng Công Ty Cổ Phần Bia-Rượu-Nước Giải Khát Hà Nội (Habeco)
Location: 183 Hoàng Hoa Thám, Ngọc Hà, Ba Đình, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 183 Hoàng Hoa Thám, Phường Ngọc Hà, Quận Ba Đình, Hà Nội
Job Description:
1. Quản lý thương hiệu nhãn hàng:
• Xây dựng kế hoạch thương hiệu theo quý, năm để đạt được mục tiêu tăng trưởng thương hiệu.
• Lên kế hoạch, triển khai tổ chức các chiến dịch theo nhãn hàng được giao.
• Nghiên cứu, theo dõi tình hình thị trường, đối thủ cạnh tranh.
2. Phối hợp bộ phận truyền thông và bộ phận thị trường lập kế hoạch, tổ chức các hoạt động, chiến dịch:
• Xây dựng các hoạt động truyền thông đưa thương hiệu tới người tiêu dùng.
• Lên ý tưởng cho các vật dụng hỗ trợ nhận diện thương hiệu tại điểm bán.
• Phối hợp với các Agency thực hiện tốt công việc được giao.
3. Quản lý, giám sát ngân sách và tiến độ thực hiện các công tác thuộc phạm vi quản lý.
4. Tổng hợp kết quả công việc và báo cáo theo yêu cầu đối với các hoạt động, mảng công việc được giao:
• Chịu trách nhiệm hiệu quả và báo cáo kết quả của chương trình triển khai.
• Theo dõi và quản lý hiệu quả và tiến độ công việc xuyên suốt hợp đồng ký kết.
• Các nội dung công việc chi tiết được trao đổi khi phỏng vấn.

Title: Supervisor Planning and Revenue Management
Location: 60A Trường Sơn, Phường 2, Tân Bình, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Tầng 7, Tòa nhà Vietjet Plaza, 60A Trường Sơn, Phường 2, Quận Tân Bình, TP. Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled leader for our Planning and Revenue Management team in the Airline Cargo Division. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing strategic planning, optimizing revenue management, and enhancing business processes within the cargo operations. The role requires a candidate with strong analytical and business analysis skills, capable of interpreting data, managing forecasts, and implementing strategies that maximize profitability
Key Responsibilities:
● Strategic Planning: Lead the development and implementation of strategic plans to optimize cargo capacity, enhance market presence, and align with overall business objectives.
● Revenue Management: Analyse market trends, pricing strategies, and demand forecasts to optimize revenue and cargo load factors. Develop pricing models and strategies that maximize yield and profitability.
● Data Analysis: Use data-driven insights to forecast demand, identify opportunities for improvement, and make strategic recommendations to enhance cargo performance.
● Performance Monitoring: Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) related to cargo operations, revenue, and market trends to ensure targets are met or exceeded.
● Process Optimisation: Continuously assess and refine processes related to capacity planning, pricing, and route optimization to enhance efficiency and responsiveness to market changes.
● Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with sales, operations, finance, and other internal teams to align revenue management strategies with overall business goals
● Reporting and Documentation: Prepare detailed reports and presentations on cargo performance, revenue trends, and strategic initiatives for senior management and stakeholders.
● Market Research: Stay updated on industry trends, competitor analysis, and market dynamics to proactively adjust strategies and maintain a competitive edge.

Title: Supplier Quality Manager - Mechanical Background
Location: Ho Chi Minh, Ho Chi Minh
Job Description:
The successful candidate is responsible for qualifying, developing, and continuously improving supplier quality performance across global supply base. This role works closely with Supply Chain, Engineering, New Production Introduction (NPI), and Operations to ensure suppliers meet quality, delivery, and compliance expectations throughout the full product lifecycle.


Description

* Lead supplier qualification, onboarding, and ongoing performance management activities
 * Perform on site supplier inspections, audits, and process assessments as required
 * Travel to supplier locations to support inspections, audits, PPAPs, and corrective action verification
 * Drive supplier quality requirements including PPAP, control plans, inspection plans, and capability studies
 * Conduct supplier audits, both on site and remote, and manage corrective actions and follow ups
 * Perform root cause analysis with suppliers and ensure effective corrective and preventive actions are implemented
 * Support NPI activities by ensuring suppliers understand fit, form, and function of the products
 * Collaborate with suppliers to improve process capability, consistency, and risk management
 * Develop and maintain Critical to Quality criteria aligned with customer and regulatory requirements
 * Monitor supplier KPIs, trends, and risk indicators to proactively address issues
 * Support incoming inspection strategies and risk-based inspection approaches
 * Partner with internal teams to resolve supplier related quality issues impacting production or customers
 * Support implementation and use of automated inspection and measurement systems at suppliers when applicable
 * Review and approve supplier documentation including FMEAs, control plans, inspection records, and certifications


Profile

* Bachelor's degree in engineering, quality, manufacturing, or a related field
 * Experience with supplier audits, PPAP, APQP, and supplier development activities
 * Proven experience performing on site supplier inspections and audits
 * Ability and willingness to visit supplier locations, as required
 * Clear and professional communication with suppliers and internal stakeholders
 * Hands-on experience using precision measuring equipment such as calipers, micrometers, height gauges, gauges, and vision systems
 * Strong capability in Root Cause Analysis and CAPA implementation
 * Experience defining and managing CTQ requirements and flowing down to suppliers
 * Strong analytical, problem solving, and decision-making skills
 * Experience working with global suppliers is a strong asset


Job Offer

Attractive salary package incl. 13th-month salary and performance bonus

16 Annual leave

and other company benefits


To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Rosie Cao at .

Title: Giám sát bán hàng - Khu vực Bình Dương (Bến Cát)
Location: Bình Dương, Việt Nam, Bến Cát, 72 Le Thanh Ton, District 1, HCMC
Job Description:
Mục tiêu:

Đạt được các mục tiêu về doanh số hoặc sản lượng của khu vực thông qua việc quản lý Nhà phân phối, đội ngũ nhân viên bán hàng và thúc đẩy thực thi trên thị trường.



***Trách nhiệm:

1. Đạt sản lượng / doanh số được giao:

*Quản lý tốt sản lượng mua vào, bán ra.

*Thực hiên các chương trình bán hàng, Trade Marketing, Marketing theo đúng nội dung và trong ngân sách được phân bổ.

*Đảm bảo thực thi chiến lược phân phối theo chiều rộng và chiều sâu.

*Nhận diện và phát triển khách hàng mới.

*Đánh giá: % thực hiện chỉ tiêu phân bổ.



2. Quản trị Nhà Phân phối (NPP)

*Đảm bảo NPP thực hiện đúng theo hợp đồng kinh doanh đã ký.

*Tìm kiếm các ứng viên tiềm năng làm NPP để đề cử cho quản lý khu vực.

*Đảm bảo sự phù hợp về cơ sở hạ tầng của NPP với sự phát triển kinh doanh

*Thông tin về chỉ tiêu doanh số hoặc sản lượng, chính sách và các chương trình bán hàng cho NPP.

*Phối hợp với NPP thực hiện kế hoạch phát triển thị trường.

*Quản trị tồn kho hiệu quả, đảm bảo cung ứng đủ hàng hóa cho thị trường,

*Đảm bảo NPP quản lý TOT theo quy định của công ty.

*Giải quyết các vấn đề về hàng hư hỏng và quyết toán chương trình.

*Phân tích P&L của NPP và đưa ra hành động cải thiện.

*Đánh giá :

- Tỷ lệ hoạt động route

- Tỷ lệ sản phẩm hỏng trên tổng doanh số

- Mức độ tồn kho của NPP so với tiêu chuẩn quy định.



3. Thực thi trên thị trường

*Thiết lập và tái thiết lập tuyến bán hàng nhằm đảm bảo hiệu suất tối đa

*Giám sát thực hiện chính sách giá và các chương trình bán hàng theo quy định của công ty.

*Triển khai, giám sát lắp đặt TOT, POSM hiệu quả và thực thi trưng bày đúng chuẩn.

*Đảm bảo DCR thực thi ghi chép báo cáo theo đúng form của TU.

*Tổng hợp thông tin về thị trường/ đối thủ cho cấp quản lý.

*Đánh giá:

- Kết quả KPIs và TU của khu vực

- % thực hiện các chương trình được phân bổ

- % lắp đặt công cụ trưng bày.

- Hình ảnh trưng bày trên thị trường theo quy định của Trade Marketing



4. Quản lý khách hàng

*Quản lý, phân loại và cập nhật DSKH theo tuyến bán hàng, loại hình và doanh số hoặc sản lượng.

*Thực thi kế hoạch và phát triển khách hàng trọng điểm.

*Tạo quan hệ tốt với khách hàng và xử lý hiệu quả các phản hồi của khách hàng.

*Đánh giá :

- Danh sách khách hàng được phân loại đầy đủ, chính xác và kịp thời.

- Tần suất viếng thăm khách hàng

- Mức độ hài lòng của khách hàng

- Hiệu quả đóng góp của khách hàng trọng điểm



5. Huấn luyện và quản lý đội ngũ nhân viên bán hàng (DCR)

Hỗ trợ tuyển dụng DCR theo quy trình.

Huấn luyện và phát triển kỹ năng DCR thông qua công cụ TU (work with, one with one, họp nhóm, …)

Lập kế hoạch chỉ tiêu và kế hoạch thực hiện cho các mục tiêu tháng cho DCR một cách hợp lý và đánh giá việc thực hiện.

*Đánh giá:

- Kết quả TU health check.

- Tỉ lệ nghỉ việc của DCR.

Title: Kỹ Sư Tư vấn kỹ thuật (Technical Consultant) | Xi măng/Bê tông
Location: E.town Central, 11 Đoàn Văn Bơ, phường 13, Quận 4, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, E-Town Central, 12F & 14F, 11 Doan Van Bo, Xom Chieu Ward, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
About the Role
As a Technical Consultant Engineer at INSEE, you will play a key role in delivering innovative concrete solutions and supporting our customers with technical expertise. This position focuses on technical consulting, complaint resolution, and pre-sales activities to strengthen INSEE’s market presence and customer trust.

Key Responsibilities
- Provide technical consulting to customers and collaborate with Sales to identify needs and deliver solutions.
- Resolve cement/concrete quality complaints within SLA and ensure customer satisfaction.
- Lead trial mix and testing activities for projects.
- Engage in pre-sales activities with architects, designers, and consultants to influence project specifications.
- Collect market and competitor information to propose solutions and improve product positioning.
- Support innovation programs (i2i) and implement value-added services for customers.

Title: [HN] Cán Bộ Marketing / Field Marketing Officer (Video & Content)
Location: CT KCN Vĩnh Tuy, Vĩnh Hưng, Hoàng Mai, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Vinh Tuy Industrial Zone, Linh Nam, Hoang Mai, Hanoi
Job Description:
* Nhiệm vụ chính:
- Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ sản xuất nội dung video với sự hiểu rõ về mục tiêu và tiến độ thời gian.
- Phối hợp hiệu quả với các bộ phận liên phòng ban để đảm bảo nội dung được triển khai đúng yêu cầu.
- Chủ động xác định các cơ hội cải thiện nội dung nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả hoạt động.
* Công việc chính:
- Xây dựng, cập nhật và duy trì Hướng dẫn Video & Nội dung (Video & Content Guidelines) cho OS & C2C, phù hợp với định hướng của Brand/CM.
- Trực tiếp tham gia vào quá trình lập kế hoạch, quay và dựng video phục vụ cho các hoạt động Thương mại điện tử, bao gồm:
+ Video bán hàng ngắn (short-form) cho TikTok & Shopee
+ Video giới thiệu sản phẩm và truyền tải thông điệp chính
- Phát triển các ý tưởng video cơ bản và kịch bản/phác thảo storyboard phù hợp với mục tiêu bán hàng và đối tượng khách hàng mục tiêu.
- Chuẩn hóa và điều chỉnh định dạng và thời lượng video theo từng nền tảng nhằm tối đa hóa khả năng tiếp cận và mức độ tương tác.
- Phối hợp với Agency, KOC và các bộ phận nội bộ để triển khai nội dung video đúng chuẩn trên các trang cửa hàng (shop page).
- Hỗ trợ đội ngũ Sales & E-commerce (EC) trong việc sử dụng tài sản video cho:
+ Tối ưu hóa trang cửa hàng (Shop page optimization)
+ Triển khai hoạt động livestream
+ Kích hoạt Affiliate
- Theo dõi và đánh giá các chỉ số hiệu quả video bao gồm: Lượt xem (Views), CTR, tỷ lệ tương tác (Engagement rate) và GMV liên kết (nếu có).
- Đảm bảo chất lượng nội dung, tính nhất quán thương hiệu và tuân thủ các quy chuẩn thương hiệu cũng như chính sách của nền tảng.
- Tổng hợp báo cáo hiệu quả nội dung và đưa ra phân tích, đề xuất (insights) cho FM Online Enablement Leader.
* Nơi làm việc: trụ sở chính Công ty CP Diana Unicharm- Lĩnh Nam, Hoàng Mai, Hà Nội

Title: Head, Business Support, Retail Brokerage (Securities)
Location: Pearl 5 Tower, Lê Quý Đôn, Vo Thi Sau Ward, Quận 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, VP-10-01, Tầng số 10, Tòa nhà Pearl 5, số 5 Lê Quí Đôn, Phường Võ Thị Sáu, Quận 3, TP.HCM, Việt Nam
Job Description:
1. JOB PURPOSE
- This position is responsible for developing and executing initiatives to support the business performance of the Retail Banking Division. Key duties include leading, managing, and coordinating the activities of the Customer Service and Business Support departments to ensure the delivery of high-quality, efficient, accurate, and compliant services.
- This role focuses on enhancing customer experience by ensuring timely resolution of requests, inquiries, and complex issues; standardizing and improving internal operational processes; promoting automation; and closely collaborating with relevant departments to implement projects that ensure seamless system and service operations.
2. RESPONSIBILITIES
a. Management Responsibilities
- Oversee all activities of the Customer Service and Business Support departments.
- Develop and implement customer service strategies aligned with the company’s business objectives.
- Manage customer service channels including call center, email, live chat, mobile app, and in-branch support.
- Train and guide staff on securities products, legal compliance, transaction operations, and professional customer service skills.
- Handle complex customer complaints and issues related to accounts and transactions.
- Collaborate with relevant departments (Product, Operations, IT, Compliance, BCCO, etc.) to improve processes and customer service solutions.
- Establish performance indicators (KPIs), evaluate work effectiveness, and implement measures to enhance productivity.
- Monitor compliance with regulations, policies, and service quality standards.
b. Project Management
- Participate in projects related to the Customer Service and Business Support departments.
- Ensure timely progress and delivery of assigned projects.
- Collaborate with relevant departments to ensure projects are completed on schedule.
c. Processes and Procedures Builder
- Responsible for developing guidelines related to the Retail Banking Division.
- Contribute to process improvements to enhance the quality of Business Support operations.
- Manage all payments related to product fees, service fees, refunds, and handle products within the Retail Banking Division.
- Ensure compliance in all approvals.
- Provide timely reports as requested.
- Try to automate at least two processes or procedures within the Business Support/Customer Service departments.
d. Other tasks as assigned.
Job Requirements: Mức độ phù hợp và xếp hạng của bạn so với ứng viên khác như thế nào?
Keyword: Ngân Hàng & Dịch Vụ Tài Chính, Dịch Vụ Hỗ Trợ Khách Hàng, Chứng khoán, Business Support, Securities, Chứng Khoán, Hỗ Trợ Kinh Doanh, Maybank Securities Limited, Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Market Access Executive/ Hospital Sales & Business Development
Location: Nexus Tower, Đường Tôn Đức Thắng, Bến Nghé, District 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Hi-Tech Park, Lot I8-1-2, D8 Street, City, Long Thạnh Mỹ, Quận 9, Vietnam
Job Description:
Opella is the self-care challenger with the purest and third-largest portfolio in the Over-The-Counter (OTC) & Vitamins, Minerals & Supplements (VMS) market globally.

Our mission is to bring health in people’s hands by making self-care as simple as it should be. For half a billion consumers worldwide – and counting.

At the core of this mission is our 100 loved brands, our 11,000-strong global team, our 13 best-in-class manufacturing sites and 4 specialized science and innovation development centers. Headquartered in France, Opella is the proud maker of many of the world’s most loved brands, including Allegra, Buscopan, Doliprane, Dulcolax, Enterogermina, Essentiale and Mucosolvan.

As a globally certified B Corp company, we are active players in the journey towards healthier people and planet. Find out more about our mission at www.opella.com.

Join us on our mission. Health. In your hands

JOB PURPOSE
The Market Access Executive is responsible for managing and monitoring the tender and procurement process to ensure the comprehensive presence of Opella’s pharmaceutical portfolio and Health Supplement products across both public and private hospital systems. The core focus is collaborating with distributors to ensure successful product listing, managing tender quotas, and driving the conversion of these quotas into actual sales to achieve growth targets within the South & Mekong territory. 

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Tender & Listing Management
- Tender Oversight: Directly monitor and expedite the entire bidding process with distributors to ensure full, timely, and legally compliant submission of tender dossiers.
- Portfolio Expansion: Ensure the inclusion of new products and maintain existing ones within hospital formularies and local provincial tender lists.
- Distributor Collaboration: Work closely with distribution partners to optimize tender dossiers, track hospital credit limits, and maximize win rates.
- Strategic Planning: Develop and propose market access strategies tailored to specific regions and customers based on market insights and competitive analysis.
- Policy Updates: Proactively stay informed on changes in tender circulars, decrees, and local healthcare policies to adjust strategies accordingly.
Commercial Excellence & Quota Conversion
- Sales Optimization: Coordinate with the Sales team to convert winning tender quotas into actual revenue by closely tracking hospital purchase orders.
- Contract Management: Monitor quota utilization at each hospital to fulfill tender commitments and prevent stock-outs or quota wastage.
- Cross-functional Collaboration: Partner with Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain, Regulatory Affairs, and other departments to ensure a seamless supply chain.
- Analysis & Reporting: Provide periodic reports on tender effectiveness, utilization rates, and regional procurement trends.
Customer Engagement & Stakeholder Management
- Strategic Networking: Establish and maintain sustainable relationships with Key Decision Makers (KDM), including Hospital Directorates, Pharmacy Departments, and Drug & Treatment Committees.
- Strategic Partnership: Position Opella as a leading healthcare solution provider through professional collaboration and patient access programs
Compliance & Ethics
- Ensure all tender activities and customer interactions strictly adhere to Opella’s Ethical Charter and Vietnamese legal regulations.

Title: Specifier
Location: 232/2 Bình Lợi, phường 13, Quận Bình Thạnh, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Lô C4, Đường số 2, KCN Hải Sơn, Bình Tiền 2, Đức Hòa Hạ, Đức Hòa, Long An.
Job Description:
1. Job Purpose & Scope
Responsible for achieving segment (Industrial/Building) Specification sales target for Vietnam. In case of business required, may be assigned to support Specification sales in Northern Area sometime).
2. Key Result Areas
• Achieve allocated annual specification sales target for the country
• Protect specified projects to ensure the projects are converted to sales
• Execute segment specification planned activities
3. Key Responsibilities & Job Content
• Identify and penetrate the following influencers in each segment.
o Architects and design firms for industrial/building projects
o Project owners/ Developers
o Government related projects including mega projects
o Roofing/partition wall system owner
• Build relationships with key decision makers above
• Work closely with them to provide the technical data and product information to implement the specifications and manage bidding processes

o Identify annual specification sales potential, key projects, key development geographical area and specification key stake holders such as architects, developers, owners and Government
o Plan specifications activities such as social media deployments, visits, seminars, lunch presentations and university talks
• Develop specification pack for the various specification stake holders and ensure the materials are always updated with the stake holders
• Drive stakeholder specification processes and specification pack to junior specifiers
• Assist and provide coaching to junior specifiers to ensure country specification sales target are achieved
• Support new marketing initiatives and product launches to specification stakeholders
• Ensure specified projects are constantly updated between the field sales to order to convert specified projects into sales revenue
• Ensure projects are constantly updated and coordinated with the field Sales using the CRM system

Title: Senior Banker/Senior Relationship Manager
Location: Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Hanoi / HCMC
Job Description:
Job Purpose
- Establish, manage, take care, maintain and develop relationships with customers in assigned portfolio in order to understand customers, identify opportunities and risks of customers and their value chains
- Proposing to develop solutions suitable for in charge customers, becoming a consultant, main funding arranger for customers and becoming the main transaction bank for customers and the value chain of these customers.
- Collaborate with product Divisions, RBG Division and support Divisions to realize opportunities and effectively manage risks for customers in charge and their value chains.
Key Accountabilities (1)
Engage in relevant direct business Functions as follows:
- Building and developing customer relationships
- Implement customer understanding
- Coordinate with Economic Sector to identify and deploy customer CVP (customer value proposition)
- Develop ACP, action plan and implement customer consultation
- Effective management by customer
Specifically, the work to be done:
- Managing, exploiting and developing relationships with customers in the assigned customer portfolio (mainly customers with diverse financial needs), ensuring to meet and exceed TOI as planned and controlled good debt quality of its entire customer portfolio Submit and defend credit proposal (if any) at Credit Committee for approval.
- Regularly review the existing portfolio, in order to detect early warning signals and potential risks. At the same time, coordinate with direct report person and related parties to propose plans to respond to arising/potential risks, and implement risk management plans for each customer.
- Coordinating with the focal department of the Division to serve the inspection, audit and control delegations periodically and when requirements arise.
- Give ideas and suggestions on business development, risk management and coordinate with relevant departments to implement those ideas.
- Maintaining and promoting relationships with all customers in their portfolio at leadership and management/operational levels
Key Accountabilities (2)
Participating in the implementation of tasks and projects of the Division and of the bank as assigned by superiors
- Implement the unit's BCP according to the bank's regulations.
- Comply with the regulations, policies, procedures, instructions of the bank and the law for the officers in the unit in charge.
Key Accountabilities (3)
People development:
- Participating in capacity development training courses; Build your own development roadmap corporate culture:
- Understand and consistently apply organizational cultural values and behavioral standards as prescribed by the bank
- Other duties as assigned by superiors

Title: Brand Director
Location: 15 Đường Trần Bạch Đằng, Thủ Thiêm, Thủ Đức, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 15 Đường Trần Bạch Đằng, Thủ Thiêm, Thủ Đức, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
1. Brand Strategy & Launching:
- Translate existing brand strategy and assets into a clear go-to-market and launch roadmap
- Lead the official market launch of the brand, ensuring strong initial impact and coherence
- Develop Long-term brand-building strategy to grow awareness, preference, and trust over time
2. PR & Communication:
- Design and execute integrated PR and communication strategies to introduce and legitimize the brand.
- Build and manage relationships with key media, lifestyle platforms, KOLs, and influencers.
- Ensure consistent brand messaging across all channels and public touch-points

3. Event Management & Experiential Marketing:
- Conceptualize and deliver flagship brand launch events (launch shows, VIP previews, brand parties).
- Develop ongoing lifestyle- and culture-driven brand experiences post-launch.
- Manage creative agencies, production partners, and external vendors to deliver premium- quality executions.

4. Leadership & Brand Governance:
- Build and lead a local brand marketing team.
- Coordinate closely with internal stakeholders while acting as the guardian of brand integrity.
- Ensure brand consistency across projects, materials, and customer experiences

*Note: This position is not focused on sales-driven or unit sell-through marketing.
The primary objective is brand value creation, reputation building, and long-term brand equity
